title: Personal Coding Preferences
content: I prefer TypeScript over JavaScript, use functional programming patterns when possible, and follow clean code principles. I use ESLint and Prettier for code formatting. I like to use modern ES6+ features and avoid var declarations.
tags: coding, typescript, functional, clean-code, eslint, prettier

title: Work Context
content: I'm a senior software engineer working on web applications. My main tech stack includes React, Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I work in a team of 8 developers using Agile methodology with 2-week sprints.
tags: job, tech-stack, react, nodejs, typescript, postgresql, agile

title: Current Project - E-commerce Platform
content: Working on modernizing the checkout flow for our e-commerce platform. Key challenges include handling payment processing, inventory management, and improving mobile UX. Using Next.js 14, Stripe API, and Supabase.
tags: current-project, ecommerce, checkout, nextjs, stripe, supabase

title: Communication Style
content: I prefer clear, concise explanations with code examples when discussing technical topics. I appreciate when complex concepts are broken down into digestible steps. I like to understand the 'why' behind recommendations, not just the 'how'.

title: Development Environment
content: Using macOS with VS Code as primary editor. Key extensions: ESLint, Prettier, GitLens, Thunder Client. Terminal: iTerm2 with zsh and oh-my-zsh. Package manager: pnpm preferred over npm. Using Docker for containerization.
tags: dev-environment, macos, vscode, iterm2, docker, pnpm

title: Learning Goals 2025
content: Want to deepen knowledge in: 1) AI/ML integration in web apps, 2) Advanced React patterns and performance optimization, 3) System design for scalable applications, 4) DevOps and CI/CD best practices

title: Side Projects
content: Building a personal productivity app using React Native and Supabase. Also experimenting with AI-powered code review tools using OpenAI API. Both projects are in early development phase.
tags: side-projects, react-native, supabase, ai, openai-api, productivity

title: Meeting Preferences
content: Prefer meetings in the afternoon (2-5 PM) when possible. Like to have agendas shared in advance. Prefer video calls over phone calls for technical discussions. Keep meetings focused and time-boxed.
